title: Serif Font help
content:
I know the type style in "SugarBritches" is "Girls are Weird" but does anyone know what the words "beachwear" and "gifts" is set in. Or can you suggest something similar to it. Looks like a condensed font.

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Temp.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140330063143/http:/typophile.com/files/Temp_0.jpg) | 80.07 KB |
author: jharrison

comments.content: It looks like **[Lucida Bright Narrow](http://web.archive.org/web/20140330063143/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Elsner%2BFlake&ffam=LucidaBrightNarEF%20-%20Roman&fid=2090a51547f5628c6f51a17e69c3a83a&fsize=60&text=Beachwear%20Gifts&fit=1)** by Kris Holmes [1987] (probably made even narrower).
